entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:58 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 06:53 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.3°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -10.5°C
Wind: W 32 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this morning. Local blowing snow early this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
